remarks: If ` A ` is not a nonpositive integer and ` N ` is a nonnegative integer, then ` A + N ` is also not a nonpositive integer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2017.)
statement:
dmgmn0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) ) $.
dmgmaddnn0.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dmgmaddnn0 $p |- ( ph -> ( A + N ) e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) ) $.
